channel.title: Blender on Dinwy's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blender on Dinwy's blog

item.title: Sculpt July 2019: Day4 Rabbit
item.description: Description Day4 rabbit. Not it feels I’m getting better about proportion and compositing. But it took too long time to do this. I should improve this. Stats Time Taken: about 03:00:00

item.title: Sculpt July 2019: Day3 Rat
item.description: Description Day3 Rat. I’ve tried fox but made a rat…. 3D sculpting is not easy. Stats Time Taken: about 02:00:00

item.title: Sculpt July 2019: Day2 Sheep
item.description: Description Day2 Sheep. I’ve tried make a sheep however I’ve mixed human face and sheep at the same time…. Stats Time Taken: about 01:30:00

item.title: Sculpt July 2019: Day1 Flamingo
item.description: Description I was thinking do I have to upload my poor sculpting. Who cares. Setting up time spend more than I”ve expected. Stats Time Taken: about 01:30:00

item.title: DoorFrame
item.description: Description Door frame rendered in Blender and UE4. Learning how to use Substance painter.

item.title: Wooden Shield
item.description: Description Inspired by Clash Royale guy, I’ve created wooden shield. Different from yesterday, I’ve tried to improve my texturing skill in Substance Painter. Reference Rascals - Clash Royale: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/myBGe

item.title: Wooden Sword
item.description: Description Inspired by Clash Royale guy, I’ve created wooden sword. Reference Rascals - Clash Royale: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/myBGe

item.title: SculptingPractice
item.description: Description Sculpting practice. References Mastering Sculpting in Blender: https://www.udemy.com/mastering-sculpting-in-blender/

item.title: StylizedTile
item.description: Description Learning how to create textures in Substance Designer. Rendered in Blender. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j03R6xKubYs

item.title: SodaCan
item.description: Description Soda can from Udemy course. https://www.udemy.com/creating-a-3d-soda-can-in-blender/

item.title: BoxRigging
item.description: Description Today I’ve practice box rigging. Thanks to https://youtu.be/qx5L8K99j10 https://youtu.be/yZhM7CR91so

item.title: PBR Marble
item.description: Description Trying to understand PBR Texture Source https://freepbr.com/

item.title: CandyLogo
item.description: Description Nothing much. Wanted to create something. So I decide to create my logo. I have spent more time in fixing the website. :( Tool Blender
